entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
